summary: Adds some mushroom soups to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

This simple mod was [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1398840-mushroom-soup/]a request[/url] for some soups made with mushrooms, and as always, I'm happy to help! The file has been cleaned with TESEDIT and requires no DLC.

I added a grand total of 5 new foods to the crafting menu. I organized the mushrooms by color - lame, I know - and made some recipes for edible soups with additional magic effects, based on the ingredients used. Here are the recipes:

[i]- Bitter Mushroom Soup: Resist Magic (Imp Stool x 2 + Bleeding Crown + Salt Pile)
- Chunky Mushroom Soup: Regen Stamina (Scaly Pholiota + Mora Tapinella + Namira's Rot + Salt Pile)
- Creamy Mushroom Soup: Resist Shock (White Cap + Swamp Fungal Pod x2 + Salt Pile)
- Red Mushroom Soup: Resist Fire (Fly Amanita + Blisterwort + Salt Pile)
- Sloppy Mushroom Soup: Restore Magicka (Glowing Mushroom x2 + Giant Lichen + Salt Pile)[/i]

The new consumables are compatible out-of-the-box with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60270/?]RND - Universal Compatibility Patch[/url]. [i][b]I will not make a dedicated patch for it or any other needs mods.[/b][/i] If you want to make one, feel free to do so. You are welcome to send it to me, if you'd like to have it uploaded here -- with credits, of course.

Special thanks to go to InsanitySorrow for the amazing [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1203-insanitys-food-stuffs-resource/]Food Stuffs Resource[/url].

To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your "Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Have fun!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
